name: Photo & Scientific Calculator - BMI Calculator
description: Photo Calculator is a multi-functional, multi-functional calculator application that includes basic calculators, scientific calculators, equation calculators and BMI.  You can solve all the complicated math problems easily.   Features:   1. Scan math problems: take pictures to solve math problems and get an immediate solution.   2. Basic Calculator: an easy-to-use percentage calculator.   3. Math problem Checker: check and correct the wrong answers in the assignment.   4. Multi-line solver: solve multi-line mathematical problems on paper at one time.   5. Scientific calculator: multi-functional scientific calculator.   6. Formula calculator: solve difficult problems.   7. BMI Calculator: easily calculate your health.   8. Calculation History: review, copy, and reuse your calculation history.   Basic Calculator.  Basic Calculator can do add up operation, subtraction operation, multiplication operation and division operation.  We also provide a percentage calculation and you can use brackets to calculate the priority content.  You will see instant math answers while you are calculating.  And theres a cursor for you to correct the mistakes in the formula.  Its an easy-to-use basic calculator better than the old one in reality.   Scientific Calculator.  This Scientific Calculator contains all the scientific calculations and theres more other scientific calculations, such as trigonometric calculation, anti-trigonometric calculation, power calculation, logarithmic calculation, square root calculation, cube root calculation, factorial calculation,  calculation and so on.  By the way, we do a humanity Interface design.  You just need to slide up from the bottom of the keyboard and you can see the scientific calculator.
